name: Squire's Slash
description: A basic attack that anyone who picks up a sword could execute. Not to be used by anyone with decent experience with longblades.

name: Straight Slash
description: A standard attack on center mass for the beginner's use. Your baseline damaging move that you can almost always execute.

name: Quick Slash
description: A light attack to gain momentum. Your baseline poise generating move that you can almost always execute.

name: Overhead Slash
description: A powerful downwards attack. A strong, baseline move to use at high poise, with a chance to score a Critical Strike.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Flicker Slash
description: A quick flick of the wrist for a fast and accurate attack. Useful against enemies with high AC when you only need a little bit more poise to reach another move's requirements. Not a good choice if you need to recover a lot of poise quickly.

name: Precision Slash
description: A fast and precise attack. A more accurate alternative to Straight Slash with a slightly higher poise cost. Useful against enemies with high AC, or when your accuracy is negatively affected.

name: Reckless Slash
description: A powerful, wild attack. Has greater usability than Overhead Swing, but lacks its Critical Strike chance and pays for its lower poise cost with poor accuracy.

name: En Garde
description: You prepare for combat. The highest poise generation in the moveset, forcing you to do nothing else for the turn.

name: Strongarm's Slash
description: A heavy attack. Only to be executed at high poise, and performs predictably well every time.

name: Swallow Reversal
description: A legendary overhead attack, able to strike down a swallow mid-flight, invented by the world's second greatest warrior. Only to be used at very high poise, its great cost comes with high damage and a chance to kill the target in a single attack.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage

name: Twin Slash
description: Attacks with both swords. A basic attack if you are dual wielding longblades, and a convincing reason to do so.

name: Sentinel's Slash
description: An attack from behind the safety of a shield. A basic attack if you are wielding a shield, compounding on its defensive benefits

name: Advancing Slash
description: An attack while you push forward. A good way to maneuver forward while still dealing some damage.

name: Retreating Slash
description: An attack while you fall back. A good way to maneuver backward while still dealing some damage.

name: Bounding Slash
description: An attack while leap forward. Decent damage and high mobility at a relatively low cost.

name: Backpedal Slash
description: An attack while you rapidly retreat. Decent damage and high mobility at a relatively low cost.

name: Knight's Slash
description: A strong attack from horseback. A stronger version of Standard Slash owing to accuracy granted by the speed of your mount.

name: Driveby Slash
description: A light attack from horseback. A stronger version of Quick Slash owing to accuracy granted by the speed of your mount.

name: Ambush Slash
description: An attack from a hiding place. A more efficient version of Overhead Slash granted by seeking cover beforehand.

name: A Thousand Cuts
description: A repeatable attack that gains power over time. A powerful and efficient option if you have enough poise to let it build up to full strength
effects: * This attack gains +1 to hit and +1d6 damage, up to a maximum of +2 to hit and +2d6 damage, for every time it has been used in succession

name: Captain's Slash
description: An inspiring attack. A strong option to support an ally if your own poise is high.
additional_requirements: * You have at least 1 adjacent ally
effects: * An adjacent ally gets +1D damage on their next hit, and they also get +1 Accuracy Token

name: Swords On Standby
description: You take a moment's reprieve with a close ally. A weak poise generating move, but with the side effect of granting some poise to an ally.
additional_requirements: * You have at least 1 adjacent ally

name: Bodyguard
description: A defensive move to protect a friend. A reliable if brief way to tank for a key member of your party.
additional_requirements: * You have at least 1 adjacent ally that is not in a line in front of you or in a Special Position
effects: * The next attack that targets the chosen ally is redirected to target you instead. This effect ends at the end of the next round.

name: Razing Slash
description: An attack on enemies hiding in brush. A strong option against enemies who are hiding, if the circumstances allow for it.
effects: * This attack ignores cover provided by tall grass or brushes, and destroys Special Positions associated with these

name: Armorbreaker
description: An attack against a heavily armored target. A powerful choice when facing an enemy in heavy armor; it will help deal with their damage reduction, but won't help you hit them.
effects: * This attack deals an additional +2d6 damage if the target is wearing heavy armor

name: Anklebiter
description: An attack to throw an enemy off balance. A basic poise damaging move.

name: Wide Slash
description: An attack on many enemies. An attack that hits the entire enemy frontline, providing strong AOE damage.
effects: * This attack hits all enemies in the frontline

name: Lunging Slash
description: An attack on a distant enemy. A solid choice to use against enemies at a distance, whether you're the one behind the frontline or they are.
effects: * This attack gains 1 level of advantage against a target who is not adjacent to you

name: Stunning Slash
description: An attack with the flat of your blade. A basic option to stun an enemy, albeit at high cost.

name: Flash of Steel
description: An attack to start the round. A powerful attack that is superior to Overhead Slash if you are the first character to act in the round.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage
* If this is the first turn of the round, this attack grants +1 Accuracy Token and has +2d6 damage

name: Long Slash
description: An attack on two enemies in a line. An attack that can hit two enemies who are neatly lined up.
effects: * This attack hits an additional target in the line behind your initial target

name: Axebreaker
description: An attack that leverages the sword's graceful superiority over the axe. A powerful option against axe users if you have it practiced.
effects: * This attack has +1 to hit and +2d6 damage if the target wields an axe

name: Blade of the Peaks
description: An attack invoking the majestic power of the mountains. A solid basic attack to use when you are exploring in a mountain region.
additional_requirements: * You are in a mountain biome
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal +1d6 damage

name: Plainsrider's Blade
description: An attack invoking the peaceful grace of the plains. A solid basic attack to use when you are exploring in a plains region.
additional_requirements: * You are in a plains biome

name: Pursuit Slash
description: An attack on a fleeing enemy, using a horse's superior speed. Use if you predict the target will attempt to maneuver backward
effects: * This attack deals an additional +2d6 damage and the target loses 15 poise if they maneuvered backward this round

name: Whirlwind Slash
description: Rapid attacks with both swords. A stronger option for dual wielding longblade users.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 11 or 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Superior Shield Arm
description: You protect someone other than yourself with your shield. An option to protect an ally if you are confident in your AC without your shield.
additional_requirements: * You have at least 1 adjacent ally
effects: * An adjacent ally gains +1 Armor Token
* You have -1 AC until the end of the next round

name: Skyward Slash
description: An attack from on high. An efficient damage dealing move if you have the high ground.
additional_requirements: * You have a height advantage on your target

name: Wave Slash
description: An attack that splashes water and muck into your enemies' eyes. A stronger version of Anklebiter when in waterlogged Special Positions.

name: Assured Vengeance
description: An attack to avenge the fallen. An extremely powerful and efficient attack to use in a worst case scenario.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage

name: Second Wind
description: You quickly catch your breath. A strong follow up to a move that repositions you.
additional_requirements: * Since the beginning of your last turn, you or an ally used a move that caused you to change position

name: Call to Arms
description: An attack to rally the troops. A move that allows an ally to maneuver.
effects: * An adjacent ally Maneuvers Forward 1 or Backward 1

name: Uppercut
description: An attack at the enemy's face. With luck, this move is a superior version of Anklebiter or Stunning Slash.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Target is stunned
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Target loses 10 poise

name: Riposte
description: A fierce counterattack. A powerful move if you are confident in your AC, or after stacking negative accuracy modifiers on an enemy.
effects: * This attack deals an additional +2d6 damage if your target missed an attack on you this round

name: Biding Slash
description: An attack by a wounded beast. If you think you might take heavy damage, this move is a good way to get some payback.
effects: * This attack deals an additional +2d6 damage if you lost at least 6 health this round

name: Clangor
description: You bash your sword against your shield and make raucous noise. The moveset's only option for poise damage to more than one enemy.
effects: * This attack hits all enemies in the frontline

name: Skewer and Slash
description: An attack to injure deeply. A strong combination of damage and poise damage.

name: Invocation Blade
description: An attack that amplifies your boons. An attack with a lot of potential if your allies can support you.
effects: * This attack benefits from doubled effectiveness of any temporary to hit bonuses or damage bonuses that allies have granted you

name: Skullduggery
description: A gambler's attack. Use this if you're feeling lucky.
effects: * On a 2, 3, or 4 - You lose 15 poise

name: Eclipse
description: An attack by a master swordsman, laying multiple strikes together. Use it whenever you can to set up for a powerful next turn.
additional_requirements: * You have rested at least once since you last executed this move
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage
* You gain an additional action during your next turn
